_instructions: Save this file as: ~/.claude/claude_desktop_config.json (for Claude Desktop)
Or as: .claude/settings.json in your project root (for Claude Code)
Remove these _comment and _instructions fields after customizing

mcpServers._filesystem_comment: Filesystem server - gives Claude access to local files
mcpServers._fetch_comment: Fetch server - allows Claude to make HTTP requests
mcpServers._custom_comment: Custom server example - replace with your own server
